title: Drag & Drop URL to create a Shortcut-Link in Explorer
body:
Drag & Drop URL to create a Shortcut-Link in Explorer (as in IE 11 / Firefox, etc.)
For that reason I must switch to Firefox instead of using Edge

comments.body: strange, this request in many instances/forms/shapes exists for years. The answer still: the short answer is "Because Microsoft hasn't yet written the code to do it"   Microsoft does not listen.
